item.description:
My good friend Mindy will be participating in the Run to Home base at Fenway that day and what better way to spend a Sunday than hanging with friends and enjoying lunch in a cool place.  The Skybox area in Game On has been reserved for us.  There are 2 couches, four tables and 3-4 high top tables for our enjoyment.  The batting cages will be available - perfect for taking out your aggressions on the way the Sox season is progressing!

Everyone will be responsible for their own tab - so please be nice to the waitstaff!

If this event goes over well, I'll be posting other bruch/lunch meet ups starting in June!

Come on out and have a blast!
item.how_to_find_us: We will have the Skybox area in game on....Meet us there or earlier in the morning in Fenway cheering on Mindy
item.name: Red Sox Natives Lunch at Game On with Mindy After TheRun To Home Base
